ARABIC: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and then neither die nor live in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In which he will neither die nor live.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he will neither die in it, nor live.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: wherein they will neither live nor die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then he neither dies in it, nor lives.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: There he will neither die nor live.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then therein he shall neither live nor die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then he shall neither die therein, nor live.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Wherein he will neither die nor live.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: where he will neither die nor live.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherein he shall neither die nor live,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then he will neither live in it, nor die.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In which they will then neither die nor live.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Wherein he will neither die (to be in rest) nor live (a good living).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: in which he will neither die nor live therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Where he will neither die, nor live.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [87:13] then he will neither die therein, and find rest, nor live, a enjoyable life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein) in the Fire (he will neither die) and thus be put out of his misery (nor live) a beneficial life.
